alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 2:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, western Wakulla, southern Liberty and Franklin Counties through 315 AM EST/215 AM CST/... At 230 AM EST/130 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Stonemill Creek to 13 miles north of Apalachicola to 15 miles south of Port St. Joe. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Crawfordville, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Jewel Fire Tower, Royal Bluff, St George Island St Pk, Central City, Beverly, Panacea, Poplar Camp, Medart, Kern, Curtis Mill, Fort Gadsden, Nine Mile and Saint Teresa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
